0100011001011001 1010011010110110 0 -> sum: 1110110100001111, cout: 0
0011001110001000 1011000010001110 1 -> sum: 1110010000010111, cout: 0
1100101010110010 0011010110010000 1 -> sum: 0000000001000011, cout: 1
0100010010101101 1110101100000101 1 -> sum: 0010111110110011, cout: 1
1000110101001001 0000110000111001 1 -> sum: 1001100110000011, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
